creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage of interior scene with typewriter, iron, clock, and pictures and poster hanging on wall; man at left wearing blue jacket with purple lapels, gesturing with his hand held out flat; couple reclining on a bed seen through a doorway at center; close-up of upper left of a woman's head, with a purple bird perched on top of her head; black borders
signed: LLC below image in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 Semiotics of Surprise
title: Semiotics of Surprise
